post.body: Female goats,however, vary in their behavior within this general pattern (O'Brien,1984). Younger females are more likely to be "leavers," who stay away from the young for long periods, during which time they rejoin their herd. Older females are likely to be "stayers," who forage nearer their hidden infant and return to it for longer periods. Females who are "leavers" are likely to become "stayers," while no "stayers" become "leavers."

Ediacaran life form R mysterious in many ways.There's vague,if any evidence of predating activities as is unraveled by fossil examination.And the worms and fish-like mollusk seemed to roam around without contact or communication with each other.

comment.body: @Nonono: 大概是中级吧 不过它们的进化史一直在海里 而海豚和人类都是从海洋生物登陆进化而来的 在脑和神经发育上或许存在优势。撇开这个优势 章鱼就显得很厉害了
they make little investment on light and chemical sensation,and have simple formation--no claws,spikes or shells
